row.process: :ATTACH_RES "STORE.ASO.NETSCALER.PLINK", "*", C echo "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#\plink.exe" -ssh -pw &NETSCALER_PASSWORD# &NETSCALER_USERNAME#@&TARGET_NETSCALER# create system backup SHP2013_&TITRE_SHAREPOINT#_&SYS_DATE_MINUS# -level full -comment "SHP2013_&TITRE_SHAREPOINT#_&SYS_DATE_MINUS#" "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#\plink.exe" -ssh -pw &NETSCALER_PASSWORD# &NETSCALER_USERNAME#@&TARGET_NETSCALER# create system backup SHP2013_&TITRE_SHAREPOINT#_&SYS_DATE_MINUS# -level full -comment "SHP2013_&TITRE_SHAREPOINT#_&SYS_DATE_MINUS#" ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

row.pre_process: !!set attribut host :PUT_ATT HOST = '&HOST_NETSCALER#' ! !set attribut login for OS-Agent :PUT_ATT LOGIN = 'LOGIN.DEFAUT' :SET &CONN_USER# = GET_ATT(USERID)!
